ac: 24, touch 11, flat-footed 22 (+6 armor, +2 Dex, +7 natural, -1 size)
special_attacks: breath weapon (30-ft. cone, once every 1d4 rounds, 10d6 fire damage, Reflex DC 21 half)
feats: Alertness, Improved Critical (bite), Improved Initiative, Skill Focus (Stealth, Survival), Weapon Focus (bite)
description: This creature resembles a powerfully built wolf the size of a large draft horse, with ebony fur and burning, fiery red eyes.

sections.body: All are fitted with shirts of fire-scorched barding, and the loyal beasts obey their master perfectly.
They are fearsome, snarling horrors in combat.

name: Hell Hound, Nessian
